sentences.en: Astrology and alchemy are occult sciences.
sentences.cn: 占星学和炼丹术为神秘之学.
天文学是由占星术演变而来的.
天文学的前身是占星术。

sentences.en: Astronomy, as distinct from astrology, is an exact science.
sentences.cn: 天文学是一门严谨的科学, 与占星术完全不同.

sentences.en: I believe in astrology to some degree,'cause they're pretty accurate.
sentences.cn: 我某种程度上相信占星术, 因为他们非常精准.

sentences.en: I have always supposed that astrology is his particular hobby.
sentences.cn: 我一直认为占星学是他的特殊爱好.

sentences.en: It does not seem very gracious for contemporary science to dismiss astrology.
sentences.cn: 用现代科学排除占星术,似乎太不讲情面了.

sentences.en: It was a great innovator in medicine, astronomy, astrology, mathematics and banking; the Babylonians may even have believed that the world was round.
sentences.cn: 它在医药，天文学，占星术，数学和银行业方面都堪称一个伟大的改革者。 甚至，古巴比伦人可能已经相信地球是圆的。

sentences.en: Many people have misconceptions about astrology.
sentences.cn: 许多人对占星学有误解.

sentences.en: She's busy writing a book on astrology.
sentences.cn: 她正忙着写一本关于占星术的书.

sentences.en: Sounds like you know your astrology. Maybe you can help me.
sentences.cn: 听起来你好像很懂星座, 也许你可以帮我.

sentences.en: The only function of economic forecasting is to make astrology look respectable.
sentences.cn: 经济预测的唯一作用是使占星术看起来体面一些.

sentences.en: They believe in astrology and let it rule their lives completely.
sentences.cn: 他们相信占星术并且由它来绝对支配他们的生活.

sentences.en: This discovery seems to validate the claims of popular astrology.
sentences.cn: 这个发现似乎能印证流行占星术的一些说法。

sentences.en: This should be contrasted with nonscientific programs and the best example of a nonscientific program is astrology.
sentences.cn: 这点与非科学假说正好相反,非科学假说最好的例子便是占星术了。

sentences.en: Vuuar : We do have astrology in Dark and Light.
sentences.cn: Vuuar:我们在黑暗与光明游戏中加入了占星学.

sentences.en: Why do people believe in astrology?
sentences.cn: 人们为什么相信占星学呢？

words.tran_cn: 占星的；占星学的，占星术的

trans.tran_cn: 占星术，占星学，原始天文学
trans.tran_en: the study of the positions and movements of the stars and how they might influence people and events
